The trial compare group university student ( N = 84 ) receive mobile CBT application intervention ( `` Feel Stress Free '' ) wait-list control group ( N = 84 ) receive intervention . Participants ask complete Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ-9 ) baseline ( part screen questionnaire ) fortnightly 12 week . Although blind possible owing nature wait list control group , researcher face-to-face contact participant , recruitment participation study entirely complete online .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Mobile Application Treating Depression Anxiety Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: This project aim test effectiveness application-based computerised Cognitive Behavioural Therapy ( cCBT ) intervention name `` Feel Stress Free '' reduce depression anxiety symptom sample UK university student . This 12-week , parallel randomise controlled trial , compare group university student ( N = 84 ) receive mobile intervention wait-list control group ( N = 84 ) receive intervention . Recruitment take place within four university partner Thrive UK , locate London South East England : University College London , University Roehampton , University Buckingham School Oriental African Studies ( University London ) . Recruitment via student union student welfare service university , use email advertisement , poster advertisement , personal referral student welfare staff , social medium ( Twitter Facebook ) . The study conduct entirely online , communication trial personnel participant via standardise email . Participants instruct sign trial navigate web page insert email address . They send link participant information sheet consent form . Once give consent , send screen questionnaire . Randomisation occur block 30 - time 30 eligible participant complete screen questionnaire , randomise independent statistician , equal number participant allocate arm . Participants intervention group receive link download `` Feel Stress Free '' application free charge , participant control group inform would receive access application trial . Those intervention group ask use app least per week 15 minute 6 week main trial , often preferred follow-up period . The `` Feel Stress Free '' application consist relaxation activity breathe exercise , progressive muscle relaxation meditation , well relax mini-games , uplifting message negative think track . Users prompt daily measure track mood , activity recommendation give need . All participant ask complete Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale Patient Health Questionnaire fortnightly 12 week , screen questionnaire take 'week 0 ' . They send reminder throughout week . The HADS measure severity anxiety depression symptom individual experiencing , PHQ measure severity depression symptom individual experiencing . Both suitable use general population . All questionnaire complete via secure email link , use Participant IDs assign begin trial . All data anonymised store , participant provide contact email address , use seek help regard study withdraw . Whilst possible blind trial personnel , owe nature wait list control group , face-to-face personalise contact trial personnel participant , unless participant sent query email .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 Provided inform consent Selfidentified often feel anxious depress , score 8 one subscales HADS ( indicate least possible caseness ) Currently student one four partnered university Had access Apple Android phone tablet , computer Firefox , Safari Chrome instal Able use aforementioned device ( computer literacy ) Failure provide valid email address one four partnered university
